Na.

nope, IBM

The user below plays minecraft using mods

I play minecraft but on my xbox

The user below m is still in primary(elementary) school or high school

Nope.

The user below me has made a tank in Besiege and/or KSP.

I think my Guntank in "show off your awesome ksp pictures!" count.

The user below me thought that the Glitch race's ship AI was a rather wizardly Optimus Prime.

Whaaat?

The user below me is on Laythe

Nope. Never been! Yet...

The user below me has made a Sun dive.

nope, not strong enough to push it off the diving board!

The person below me likes sardines!

Yes.

The user below me likes shrimp.

Fried shrimp. Yummy.

The user below me likes popcorn!

Only salted. So yes!

The user below me lives in Sweden.

Nope. 'Murica!

The user below me has reached Bop.

No bop 4 me.

The user below me owns a dog.

No. We're waiting to see if we can handle kids before committing to the responsibility of a dog.

The user below me has worn a kilt.

False

But it would probably look weird on me.

The user below me acknowledges only 3 star wars films?

False. While the big three was clearly better, all six made to date are way better than most other films. Even though Hayden Christensen sucks IMO.

The user below me knows how to fly a real plane.

Um... not legally. But I know the theory. Sort of.

The user below me has been to at least 5 other countries.

Not even one. :/

The user below me has been scuba diving.

Nope.

The user below me has a dog.

Nope. Hate them.

The user below me is not a brony.

true. just why are the ponies atrractive? I might never see why.

the user below me has a laptop

Using it right now to write this post.

The user below me has ever thought about the impending doom of humanity.

All the time!

The user below me seen Mercury.
